cleaned_text: Getting vaccinated is the best way to protect yourself against some serious illnesses. Discover all the information and advice to help you make an informed decision for you and your children. Vaccination is the most effective way to prevent the spread of serious infectious diseases. To understand how vaccines work, to separate fact from fiction regarding information about vaccination and get some advice, consult the following pages: You can avoid many infectious diseases by getting vaccinated. These diseases can have serious consequences and sometimes even cause death. Learn about the risks and symptoms associated with these diseases and get vaccinated to be protected against them.
